mapper.select: SELECT sm.* , CASE WHEN (sm.like_count / 50 * 100) >= 100 THEN 100 ELSE (sm.like_count / 50 * 100) END AS like_per FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS num , sm.suggestion_idx , sm.title , sm.content , sm.create_user , DATE_FORMAT(sm.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS create_date , sm.del_chk , u.name AS create_user_name , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM daul.user_like where parent_idx = sm.suggestion_idx) AS like_count , (SELECT count(*) FROM suggestion_opinion a WHERE a.suggestion_idx = sm.suggestion_idx) AS opinion_cnt FROM daul.suggestion_main sm LEFT JOIN user u ON u.user_id = sm.create_user , (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE sm.del_chk != 'Y' ORDER BY sm.create_date DESC ) sm WHERE sm.num <= 3

SELECT sm.* FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS num , sm.survey_idx , sm.title , sm.content , sm.survey_type , DATE_FORMAT(sm.s_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS s_date , DATE_FORMAT(sm.e_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS e_date , sm.create_user , del_chk , (SELECT count(*) FROM survey_participation WHERE survey_idx = sm.survey_idx) AS participation_count , (SELECT count(*) FROM survey_opinion WHERE survey_idx = sm.survey_idx) AS opinion_count FROM daul.survey_main sm , (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE sm.del_chk != 'Y' ORDER BY sm.create_date DESC ) sm WHERE sm.num <= 3

SELECT ca.* FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS num , ca.admin_contest_idx , ca.title , ca.content , DATE_FORMAT(ca.contest_s_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS contest_s_date , DATE_FORMAT(ca.contest_e_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS contest_e_date , DATE_FORMAT(ca.submit_s_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS submit_s_date , DATE_FORMAT(ca.submit_e_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS submit_e_date , ca.create_user , ca.del_chk , (SELECT count(*) FROM contest_user WHERE admin_contest_idx = ca.admin_contest_idx) AS user_contest_cnt FROM daul.contest_admin ca , (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE ca.del_chk != 'Y' ORDER BY ca.create_date DESC ) ca WHERE ca.num <= 3

SELECT n.* FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS num , n.notice_idx , n.title , DATE_FORMAT(n.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS create_date FROM daul.daul_notice n , (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP WHERE n.del_chk != 'Y' ORDER BY n.create_date DESC ) n WHERE n.num <= 5
